item.title: Building More Resilient Backend Infrastructure
item.description: When building for the web, the backend infrastructure is usually the part that needs the most security and resilience. Over the years, the web has grown very large. There are billions of people surfing the web today. Some perspective To put it in perspective, Facebook has over 2.7 billion monthly active users as of the second quarter of 2020 (1), Instagram has over 1 billion monthly active users (2), Twitter has over 330 million (3).
